page.title: 11Shopping Facilities,Meltham
page.content: Out of forty different people interviewed the majority,that is ninety-three percent resided in Meltham,but thirty-eight citizens shopped in Huddersfield as well.The shopping facilities were found to be adequate for a population of a village of this size.The neighbouring town Huddersfield was cheaper than Meltham and contained shops like clothes for the whole family,health foods, toys, records, opticians and amusement centres which Meltham couldn't offer. The village was more convenient though, as Huddersfield is five miles away.Most interviewees shopped every day.The only criticism about Meltham are the closing hours,that they shouldn't shut at dinner times or on Wednesday afternoon and Saturday afternoon.However the facilities are very satisfactory.
